name: Vorpal Sword
questHint: Forged for war against man and beast alike.
flavour: The blade hums with an eager, almost hungry resonance.
description: +3 to attack and damage. Ignores resistance to slashing. On nat 20, decapitate. Crits deal extra 6d8 slashing.

name: Holy Avenger
questHint: Blessed against unholy abominations.
flavour: The blade radiates warmth of dawn breaking over battlefields.
description: +3 to attack and damage. Extra 2d10 radiant vs fiends/undead. 10ft aura grants advantage on saves vs magic.

name: Oathbow
questHint: Suitable for hunting miscreants and ne'er-do-wells.
flavour: Carved from heartwood of a tree that witnessed betrayal.
description: Mark sworn enemy for 7 days. Advantage, ignore cover, +3d6 damage vs sworn. Disadvantage vs others.

name: Bow of Warning
questHint: Indispensable for uncovering the truth.
flavour: The bowstring hums with constant vigilance.
description: +2 to attack and damage. Advantage on initiative. You and allies within 30ft can't be surprised.

name: Sun Blade
questHint: Blessed against unholy abominations.
flavour: A blade of pure sunlight springs forth from the hilt.
description: +2 to attack and damage. Deals radiant. Emits 15ft sunlight. Extra 1d8 radiant vs undead.

name: Luck Blade
flavour: Fortune favours those who carry this blade.
description: +1 to attack, damage, and saves. Reroll 1/day. Has 1d4-1 Wish charges.

name: Dancing Sword
questHint: Battle-tested and soldier-approved.
flavour: Release the blade and it fights on its own.
description: Bonus action to release. Hovers 30ft, attacks using your stats for 4 rounds.

name: Shadowfang
questHint: Essential for skulduggery and clandestine affairs.
flavour: This blade drinks the light around it, leaving only shadow.
description: +3 to attack and damage. Deals extra 2d6 necrotic. While holding, you can cast Misty Step 1/short rest.

name: Armor of Invulnerability
questHint: Forged for war against man and beast alike.
flavour: Forged by master smiths, this armor turns aside all but the most powerful blows.
description: AC 18. Resistance to nonmagical damage. Action to become immune to nonmagical damage for 10 min (1/day).

name: Cloak of Invisibility
questHint: Essential for skulduggery and clandestine affairs.
flavour: The fabric seems woven from twilight itself.
description: Pull hood up to become invisible for up to 2 hours total. Regains 1 hour per 12 hours unused.

name: Cloak of Arachnida
questHint: A shadow-walker's essential.
flavour: Spun from phase spider silk.
description: Climb any surface including ceilings. Move through webs freely. Can't be caught in webs. Resistance to poison.

name: Belt of Fire Giant Strength
questHint: Forged for war against man and beast alike.
flavour: Forged in volcanic fire.
description: Your Strength score becomes 25.

name: Flame Tongue Longsword
questHint: Forged for war against man and beast alike.
flavour: The steel carries an inner fire that never dies.
description: Bonus action to ignite. While ablaze, deals extra 2d6 fire damage and sheds 40ft bright light.

name: Frost Brand Longsword
questHint: Forged for war against man and beast alike.
flavour: Ice crystals form along the blade's edge.
description: Deals extra 1d6 cold. Fire resistance while held. In freezing temps, sheds 10ft bright light.

name: Greatsword +2
questHint: Battle-tested and soldier-approved.
flavour: A massive blade that cleaves through armor.
description: +2 to attack and damage rolls.

name: Longsword +2
questHint: Battle-tested and soldier-approved.
flavour: A masterfully forged blade.
description: +2 to attack and damage rolls.

name: Cleaving Battleaxe
questHint: Forged for war against man and beast alike.
flavour: This axe hungers to bite into the next foe.
description: +1 to attack and damage. When you reduce a creature to 0 HP, make one additional attack as a bonus action.

name: Longbow +2
questHint: A bounty hunter's trusted companion.
flavour: Masterfully crafted with enchanted limbs.
description: +2 to attack and damage rolls.

name: Bow of Unerring Accuracy
questHint: Favoured by those who hunt men for coin.
flavour: Arrows loosed from this bow find their mark with supernatural precision.
description: +1 to attack and damage. Ignore half and three-quarters cover. No disadvantage at long range.

stats.Special: Ignore cover, no long range penalty

name: Arrows of Humanoid Slaying (5)
questHint: For the grim business of bringing outlaws to justice.
flavour: Black-fletched arrows that seek the hearts of men.
description: If a humanoid takes damage, DC 17 Con save or take extra 6d10 piercing.

name: Venom Fang
questHint: Favoured by those who hunt men for coin.
flavour: A wicked blade with channels that weep deadly green ichor.
description: +1 to attack and damage. On hit, extra 2d10 poison damage.

name: Rapier +2
questHint: For navigating webs of lies and secrets.
flavour: An elegant weapon, perfectly balanced.
description: +2 to attack and damage rolls.

name: Vicious Dagger
questHint: A shadow-walker's essential.
flavour: The blade seems eager to draw blood.
description: When you roll a 20 on attack, deal extra 2d6 damage. +7 extra damage on crits.

name: Swiftshot Shortbow
questHint: A bounty hunter's trusted companion.
flavour: A compact bow that nocks arrows of its own accord.
description: +1 to attack and damage. Once per turn on hit, make another attack as part of the same action.

name: Plate Armor +1
questHint: Battle-tested and soldier-approved.
flavour: Masterwork plate with magical reinforcement.
description: AC 19. Disadvantage on Stealth. Requires Str 15.

name: Half Plate +1
questHint: Battle-tested and soldier-approved.
flavour: Reinforced half plate with enchanted joints.
description: AC 16 + Dex (max 2). Disadvantage on Stealth.

name: Shield +2
questHint: For those sworn to protect others.
flavour: A sturdy shield with powerful protective enchantments.
description: +4 AC total with shield.

name: Armor of Resistance (Fire)
questHint: Proven effective against creatures most foul.
flavour: Runes of protection glow faintly across the links.
description: AC 16. Resistance to fire damage.

name: Elven Chain
questHint: A shadow-walker's essential.
flavour: Delicate elven links that move without sound.
description: AC 14 + Dex (max 2). No Stealth disadvantage. You can wear it under clothes.

name: Cloak of Displacement
questHint: A shadow-walker's essential.
flavour: Projects an illusion making you appear elsewhere.
description: Attackers have disadvantage against you. Resets at start of your turn if you take damage.

name: Studded Leather +1
questHint: A shadow-walker's essential.
flavour: Supple leather enchanted to turn aside weapons.
description: AC 13 + Dex. No stealth penalty.

name: Glamoured Studded Leather
questHint: For navigating webs of lies and secrets.
flavour: This armor shifts to appear as normal clothing.
description: AC 13 + Dex. Bonus action to change appearance to normal clothes.

name: Bracers of Defense
flavour: Etched with protective runes.
description: +2 AC if wearing no armor and using no shield.

name: Longsword +1
flavour: A reliable blade with minor enchantments.
description: +1 to attack and damage rolls.

name: Battleaxe +1
questHint: Battle-tested and soldier-approved.
flavour: Dwarven runes mark this sturdy axe.
description: +1 to attack and damage rolls.

name: Warhammer +1
questHint: Battle-tested and soldier-approved.
flavour: A balanced hammer that strikes true.
description: +1 to attack and damage rolls.

name: Javelin of Lightning
questHint: Battle-tested and soldier-approved.
flavour: Lightning crackles along the shaft when thrown.
description: Speak command word when throwing: becomes bolt of lightning. 4d6 lightning in 120ft line, Dex DC 13 half. 1/dawn.

name: Longbow +1
questHint: A bounty hunter's trusted companion.
flavour: A well-balanced bow with minor enchantments.
description: +1 to attack and damage rolls.

name: Shortbow +1
questHint: A shadow-walker's essential.
flavour: A compact bow for quick shots.
description: +1 to attack and damage rolls.

name: Arrows of Fire (10)
questHint: Proven effective against creatures most foul.
flavour: The arrowheads glow with flame.
description: On hit, extra 1d6 fire damage. Target DC 12 Dex or catch fire (1d6/turn).

name: Shortsword +1
flavour: A swift blade for close work.
description: +1 to attack and damage rolls.

name: Dagger +1
questHint: A shadow-walker's essential.
flavour: A slim blade that finds gaps in armor.
description: +1 to attack and damage rolls.

name: Daggers of Returning (Pair)
questHint: Favoured by those who hunt men for coin.
flavour: Twin blades forever drawn back to each other.
description: +1 to attack and damage. Returns to hand immediately after thrown.

name: Rapier +1
flavour: A duelist's weapon of choice.
description: +1 to attack and damage rolls.

name: Chain Mail +1
questHint: Battle-tested and soldier-approved.
flavour: Expertly forged links that turn aside blows.
description: AC 17. Disadvantage on Stealth. Requires Str 13.

name: Scale Mail +1
flavour: Overlapping metal scales with enchanted binding.
description: AC 15 + Dex (max 2). Disadvantage on Stealth.

name: Shield +1
questHint: For those sworn to protect others.
flavour: A well-made shield with minor protective enchantments.
description: +3 AC total with shield.

name: Sentinel Shield
questHint: For those sworn to protect others.
flavour: An eye emblazoned on the face, always alert.
description: Advantage on initiative rolls and Perception checks.

name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
questHint: Battle-tested and soldier-approved.
flavour: Heavy iron gauntlets that pulse with bestial strength.
description: Your Strength score becomes 19.

name: Studded Leather of Shadows
questHint: A shadow-walker's essential.
flavour: This armor seems to drink in light.
description: AC 12 + Dex. Advantage on Stealth checks made in dim light or darkness.

name: Cloak of Elvenkind
questHint: For those who prefer shadows to sunlight.
flavour: Woven from spider silk and shadow.
description: With hood up, Perception to see you has disadvantage, you have advantage on Stealth to hide.

name: Boots of Elvenkind
questHint: A shadow-walker's essential.
flavour: Soft leather boots that absorb sound.
description: Your steps make no sound. Advantage on Stealth that relies on moving silently.

name: Ring of Protection
flavour: Silver bands interweave in an endless knot.
description: +1 bonus to AC and saving throws.

name: Silvered Longsword
questHint: Proven effective against creatures most foul.
flavour: Silver-plated blade effective against certain creatures.
description: Overcomes resistance of creatures vulnerable to silver (werewolves, devils, etc).

name: Silvered Shortsword
questHint: Proven effective against creatures most foul.
flavour: A swift blade plated in silver.
description: Overcomes resistance of creatures vulnerable to silver.

name: Silvered Arrows (20)
questHint: Proven effective against creatures most foul.
flavour: Silver-tipped arrows for hunting lycanthropes.
description: Overcomes resistance of creatures vulnerable to silver.

name: Masterwork Light Crossbow
flavour: Exceptionally well-crafted, this crossbow is a joy to use.
description: Reduces loading time. You don't have disadvantage from being within 5ft of a hostile creature.

name: Quality Chain Shirt
flavour: Well-made chain that moves with you.
description: AC 13 + Dex (max 2). Reduced noise compared to standard chain.

name: Quality Leather Armor
flavour: Supple leather that doesn't restrict movement.
description: AC 11 + Dex. Extra comfortable for long wear.

name: Quality Shield
flavour: A well-balanced shield that doesn't tire the arm.
description: +2 AC. Lighter than standard shields.

name: Helm of Minor Protection
flavour: A sturdy helm that's saved many a skull.
description: Once per day, when you would be critically hit, you can turn it into a normal hit instead.

name: Potion of Greater Healing
questHint: Battle-tested and soldier-approved.
flavour: A swirling red liquid that glows from within.
description: Regain 4d4 + 4 hit points.

name: Potion of Superior Healing
questHint: When lives hang in the balance.
flavour: A brilliant crimson potion with healing magic.
description: Regain 8d4 + 8 hit points.

name: Potion of Invisibility
questHint: Essential for skulduggery and clandestine affairs.
flavour: This potion's container looks empty but feels full.
description: Invisible for 1 hour. Ends early if you attack or cast a spell.

name: Bag of Holding
questHint: Useful for recovery operations.
flavour: Interior is much larger than outside dimensions.
description: Holds 500 lbs / 64 cu ft. Always weighs 15 lbs.

name: Boots of Speed
questHint: Favoured by those who hunt men for coin.
flavour: Winged designs on the heels glow when activated.
description: Bonus action to double walking speed for 10 minutes. 1/long rest.

name: Gloves of Thievery
questHint: For acquiring items by... creative means.
flavour: Thin as a second skin, leaving no fingerprints.
description: Invisible while worn. +5 bonus to Sleight of Hand and lockpicking.

name: Eyes of the Eagle
questHint: Aids in finding that which is lost or hidden.
flavour: Crystal lenses that pull distant objects closer.
description: Advantage on Perception (sight). See details up to 1 mile.

name: Lantern of Revealing
questHint: Indispensable for uncovering the truth.
flavour: The flame burns with an otherworldly blue light.
description: 30ft bright, 30ft dim. Invisible creatures are visible in bright light.

name: Dimensional Shackles
questHint: For the grim business of bringing outlaws to justice.
flavour: Heavy iron shackles with glowing runes.
description: Prevents teleportation and extradimensional travel. Size Small to Large.

name: Rope of Climbing
questHint: Essential for venturing into the unknown.
flavour: Silk rope that responds to whispered commands.
description: 60ft rope, holds 3000 lbs. Command word animates it.

name: Sending Stones
questHint: Standard issue for soldiers and caravan guards.
flavour: Smooth stones with matching runes.
description: Cast sending 1/day. Works across any distance on same plane.

name: Potion of Healing
flavour: A red liquid that shimmers when agitated.
description: Regain 2d4 + 2 hit points.

name: Antitoxin (3 doses)
questHint: Proven effective against creatures most foul.
flavour: A bitter liquid that neutralizes poison.
description: Advantage on saves vs poison for 1 hour.

name: Hat of Disguise
questHint: For navigating webs of lies and secrets.
flavour: A fashionable hat that shifts to suit any disguise.
description: Cast disguise self at will while wearing.

name: Masterwork Thieves' Tools
questHint: For acquiring items by... creative means.
flavour: Picks, files, and probes of the finest quality.
description: +2 bonus to lockpicking and trap disarming.

name: Medallion of Thoughts
questHint: For navigating webs of lies and secrets.
flavour: A silver medallion inscribed with a stylized eye.
description: 3 charges. Cast detect thoughts (DC 13). Regains 1d3 at dawn.

name: Ring of Mind Shielding
questHint: For navigating webs of lies and secrets.
flavour: A plain silver band that warms when mental intrusion is attempted.
description: Immune to magic that reads thoughts, detects lies, or knows alignment.

name: Dust of Disappearance
questHint: Essential for skulduggery and clandestine affairs.
flavour: Fine grey powder that bends light.
description: Throw in air to coat creatures within 10ft. Invisible for 2d4 minutes.

name: Slippers of Spider Climbing
questHint: For delicate work in civilised places.
flavour: Soft-soled slippers that grip any surface.
description: Climb difficult surfaces including ceilings without ability checks.

name: Smoke Pellets (5)
questHint: A shadow-walker's essential.
flavour: Small pellets that burst into smoke.
description: Throw as action. 10ft radius heavily obscured for 1 minute.

name: Bounty Hunter's Brand
questHint: Favoured by those who hunt men for coin.
flavour: An iron brand that marks your quarry.
description: Action to mark creature for 24 hours. Know direction and distance. 1/long rest.

name: Net of Snaring
questHint: Suitable for hunting miscreants and ne'er-do-wells.
flavour: Enchanted fibers that tighten when struggling.
description: +2 to attack. Restrained creature has disadvantage on escape (DC 15).

name: Mithral Manacles
questHint: For the grim business of bringing outlaws to justice.
flavour: Lightweight but incredibly strong manacles.
description: DC 25 to break, DC 20 to escape. Weighs only 1 lb.

name: Tangling Bolas
questHint: Suitable for hunting miscreants and ne'er-do-wells.
flavour: Weighted cords that magically tighten.
description: On hit, DC 13 Str save or restrained. Returns to hand next turn.

name: Seeker's Wanted Poster
questHint: Favoured by those who hunt men for coin.
flavour: A magical poster that updates with the target's location.
description: Shows target's face and compass pointing toward them within 1 mile.

name: Rope of Entanglement
questHint: When lives hang in the balance.
flavour: This rope writhes like a living snake.
description: Command to entangle creature within 20ft. DC 15 Dex or restrained.

name: Investigator's Lens
questHint: Indispensable for uncovering the truth.
flavour: Magnifying glass that reveals hidden details.
description: Advantage on Investigation to find hidden details or forgeries. Reads invisible ink.

name: Whistle of Warning
questHint: Standard issue for soldiers and caravan guards.
flavour: Silver whistle with selective sound.
description: Sound only heard by up to 6 designated creatures within 1 mile.

name: Diplomat's Pouch
questHint: For those who wield words as weapons.
flavour: Leather case that protects contents from all harm.
description: Documents inside protected from water, fire, damage. Hidden compartment (DC 20).

name: Banner of Parley
questHint: Bears weight in clan dealings.
flavour: A white banner recognized across all clan territories.
description: Clan warriors won't attack first. Advantage on Persuasion in clan negotiations.

name: Seal of the Witness
questHint: Upholds the letter of the law.
flavour: An official seal marking the bearer as a neutral witness.
description: Sealed documents become binding - breakers glow for 24 hours. +2 Insight in negotiations.

name: Torc of Standing
questHint: Honoured in negotiations between the great clans.
flavour: A twisted metal torc worn by those with honour among the clans.
description: Treated as having +1 higher honour with all clans. Can't wear at -3 or lower.

name: Incense of Truth
questHint: Sanctified by temple priests.
flavour: Temple-blessed incense that encourages honesty.
description: When burned, creatures within 10ft have disadvantage on Deception for 10 min.

name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
questHint: Blessed for journeys upon the waves.
flavour: The dark fabric flows like water and sprouts fins when submerged.
description: Breathe underwater and swim speed of 60 feet while hood up in water.

name: Trident of the Waves
questHint: Essential for nautical ventures and pirate hunting.
flavour: Barnacles cling to the shaft, tines gleam with oceanic sheen.
description: +2 to attack and damage. Breathe underwater while holding. No thrown penalty underwater.

name: Returning Harpoon
questHint: For dealing with sea-borne scoundrels.
flavour: A rope of solidified seawater connects the harpoon to your grip.
description: +1 to attack and damage. Returns after thrown. Can grapple Large or smaller on hit (DC 14).

name: Potion of Water Breathing
questHint: Blessed for journeys upon the waves.
flavour: Cloudy green fluid that smells of the sea.
description: Breathe underwater for 1 hour.

name: Sailor's Charm
questHint: Blessed for journeys upon the waves.
flavour: Anchor pendant carved from driftwood.
description: Hold breath 2x longer. Advantage on swimming checks.

name: Gauntlets of Forgefire
questHint: Proven effective against creatures most foul.
flavour: Veins of molten metal run through these gauntlets.
description: Resistance to fire. Unarmed strikes deal +1d6 fire. Can heat metal by touch.

name: Cloak of Northern Furs
questHint: Essential for venturing into the unknown.
flavour: Thick furs from the northern beasts.
description: Auto-succeed saves vs extreme cold. Advantage on Survival in cold climates.

name: Blackstone War Paint
questHint: Battle-tested and soldier-approved.
flavour: Dark paint made from crusite minerals.
description: Apply as action. For 1 hour: +1 Intimidation, enemies have disadvantage on opportunity attacks vs you.

name: Horn of Rally
questHint: Standard issue for soldiers and caravan guards.
flavour: A brass horn used by caravan guards.
description: When blown, allies within 300ft know your location and can't be frightened for 1 min. 1/day.

name: Boots of the Longstrider
questHint: A guardian's gear for long journeys.
flavour: Well-worn boots that never tire the wearer.
description: Walking speed +10ft. Ignore difficult terrain from undergrowth or rough roads.
